title: F1 2026: The ultimate guide to new rules and changes
summary: Find out everything that will change in Formula 1 in 2026, from engines to new teams and rules

qa_pairs.question: What significant change regarding engines is set to occur in Formula 1 starting in 2026?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The introduction of new power unit regulations requiring more sustainable fuels.
wrong_options: The return to naturally aspirated engines.
The use of V10 engines exclusively.

qa_pairs.question: Which new teams are expected to join the Formula 1 grid in 2026?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Potential new teams are not officially confirmed, but candidates include Audi and Porsche.

qa_pairs.question: How will the rules regarding car design change in F1 for the 2026 season?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: There will be stricter regulations to improve safety and reduce costs.
wrong_options: Complete freedom in design with no limitations.
A return to ground effect aerodynamics.
Mandatory use of a single chassis supplier.
